name: IKScannerDeviceViewDelegate
desc: The IKScannerDeviceViewDelegate protocol defines the delegate protocol that the IKScannerDeviceView delegate must conform to.

items.name: func scannerDeviceView(IKScannerDeviceView!, didScanTo: URL!, fileData: Data!, error: Error!)
items.desc: Invoked when the scan has completed and the data is available.

items.name: func scannerDeviceView(IKScannerDeviceView!, didEncounterError: Error!)
items.desc: Invoked whenever the scanner encounters an error.

items.name: func scannerDeviceView(IKScannerDeviceView!, didScanTo: ICScannerBandData!, scanInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]!, error: Error!)
func scannerDeviceView(IKScannerDeviceView!, didScanTo: URL!, error: Error!)
